cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 2nd Dec 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 2nd Dec 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Price is for 2 people our Economy rooms contain a king/queen bed , TV, VOD, guest-accounting & hotel compendium, broadband internet access, tea & plunger-coffee, opening windows, air-conditioning and security-card access,with SHARED bathroom facilities

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Price is for 2 people.Superior rooms contain a king/queen bed, a single bed, a sofa,a writing desk, room safe,satellite TV, VOD, ,broadband internet access, tea & plunger-coffee, opening windows, A/C & heating, ironing facilities & security-card access.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Price is for 2 people, Standard Double room  contains a king/queen bed, room safe , satellite TV, video-on-demand,broadband internet access, tea & plunger-coffee, opening windows, A/C & heating, ironing facilities & security-card access.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
